socketscs.server module¶

class socketscs.server.Server(address='MacBook-Air-4.local', port=1234)[source]¶

Bases: object

This is a simple tcp/ip server class, to be run with a paired client

Parameters

  • address (str, optional) – IP address of where the server should listen

  • port (int, optional) – port for server to listen on

is_alive()[source]¶

Returns whether the server is running or not

Return type

boolean

sendHeartbeat()[source]¶

triggers the heartbeat to be sent from the server

set_message(message)[source]¶

Queues a message to be sent to the client from the server

Parameters

message (str) – the message to be sent by the client

start()[source]¶

Triggers the server to start listening, returns success or failure. Starts two new threads, t1 to listen for new connections and t3 to queue new messages to be sent

Return type

boolean

stop()[source]¶

Stops the server
